title: S7E10 – "Pick Your Poison" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author N.M. Brown, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about furious fathers, marital mischief, devilish desserts, and nightmarish nature.
